full_featured_frameworks.name: Full-Featured Frameworks
full_featured_frameworks.description: All-in-one solutions designed to handle crawling (visiting many pages) and scraping (extracting data) at scale.
full_featured_frameworks.best_for: Large projects requiring structured data and managed workflows.

repos.name: crawlee
repos.description: Crawlee‚ÄîA web scraping and browser automation library for Node.js to build reliable crawlers. In JavaScript and TypeScript. Extract data for AI, LLMs, RAG, or GPTs. Download HTML, PDF, JPG, PNG, and other files from websites. Works with Puppeteer, Playwright, Cheerio, JSDOM, and raw HTTP. Both headful and headless mode. With proxy rotation.
